properties.title: Open-Source Java implementation of the german DTAUS file format
properties.author: Christian Schulte

section.name: Introduction
section.p: jDTAUS provides an open-source implementation of the german DTAUS file format for the Java platform.

To get you going a GUI application is available demonstrating all features directly provided by the API. It is distributed using Java-Webstart. You will first have to install the latest Java Runtime Environment available at www.java.com for free. After downloading and installing Java, the following link will web-start the application.

section.name: Download
section.p: All-in-one Windows installation executable. Note: This installation executable also includes a Java runtime environment. You do not need to download Java separately when using this download.
Unix tar archive. Note: This installation executable does not include a Java runtime environment. You will have to install the Java runtime environment appropriately to your system.

section.name: Modules
section.p: All modules of the Java implementation are deployed to group org.jdtaus at the central Maven 2 repository. We would like to ask you to either send a mail to support@jdtaus.org for any implementation defects you might encounter or file a bug report with the bugzilla installation. For general feedback or feature requests a public mailing list is available. Announcements of new releases are sent out to the jdtaus-users mailing list.
